General.Name: China Shuifa Singyes Energy Holdings Limited
General.Description: China Shuifa Singyes Energy Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, designs, fabricates, and installs conventional curtain walls and solar projects in Hong Kong. Its solar projects include building integrated photovoltaic systems, roof top solar systems, and ground mounted solar systems. The company manufactures and sells smart grid systems and solar thermal systems. In addition, it offers renewable energy products, such as wind power, photovoltaic project supporting, and solar thermal products. Further, the company engages in the development of new energy materials and marine biology technology; research and development of energy- saving products; research and development of electricity and new energy; provision of engineering design services; and research, construction, and operation of solar power station. China Shuifa Singyes Energy Holdings Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong.
General.Address: China Merchants Tower, Central, Hong Kong
